attributes.review:
when i downloaded this app and opened it, i was met with a horrible photo of a very scary looking man. i decided to put that aside and use the app and now my phone is hacked and there are literal stalkers outside my house. they’ve kidnapped my dog, i don’t know what to do at this point.
